trans-unit.source: How to use the Template Starter
trans-unit.target: Tza'n qajb'el tnejil ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj

trans-unit.source: This special template lets you make your own templates. A template provides a set of related page layouts that an author can choose from in writing an original book. Usually the text blocks and picture blocks on template pages will be empty, ready for an author to fill in. Sometimes there may be standard text or pictures that should be on every copy of the page. There are two ways people can use your template. The first way is to start new books. For example, imagine student books that have one page for each school day of the week. You could make a template with 5 pages, each with places to type in text and choose pictures. Curriculum authors could select your template and make a new book, one for each week1.
trans-unit.target: A ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj lu' axix ntzaj tq'o'n amb'il tu'n tkub' b'inchet qe tex ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj. Jun ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj ntzaj tq'o'n jun k'loj b'inchb'il qe t-xaq at kyxilen ex b'a'n tu'n tjaw tsak'o'n ajb'inchal te tz'ib'il jun u'jb'il txuylal. A qe swejin te txolyol ex qe swejin te tilb'ilal kyuj qe t-xaq te ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj minti' kyuj qe, noqx ayo'n tu'n tnojset tu'n jun ajb'inchal. At maj qkanetil txolyol mo tilb'ilal te junxix tumlal ilx ti'j tu'n kyten tuj ju'njun txolil aq'unb'il t-xaq. At kab'e tu'mel tu'n tajb'en kyu'n xjal qe ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj. Tnejil tu'mel a tu'n t-xi' qe' ak'aj u'jb'il. Noq na'nxa u'jb'il kye ajxnaq'tzanjtz te jun t-xaq tuj ju'njun q'ij txnaq'tzb'il tuj seman. Jaku kub' tb'inchana jun ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj te 5 t-xaq, teylex te ju'jun tuk'il tswejin tu'n tku'x tz'ib'et txolyol ex sak'ol tilb'ilal. Qe ajb'inchal txolxnaq'tz jaku kyjaw sak'o'n ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj tu'n tb'ant jun ak'aj u'jb'il, jun tuj ju'njun seman1.

alt-trans.target: A ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj lu' axix ntzaj tq'o'n amb'il tu'n tkub' b'inchet qe tex ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj. Jun ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj ntzaj tq'o'n jun k'loj b'inchb'il qe t-xaq at kyxilen ex b'a'n tu'n tjaw tsak'o'n ajb'inchal te tz'ib'il jun u'jb'il txuylal. A qe swejin te txolyol ex qe swejin te tilb'ilal kyuj qe t-xaq te ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj minti' kyuj qe, noqx ayo'n tu'n tnojset tu'n jun ajb'inchal. At maj qkanetil txolyol mo tilb'ilal te junxix tumlal ilx ti'j tu'n kyten tuj ju'njun txolil aq'unb'il t-xaq. At kab'e tu'mel tu'n tajb'en kyu'n xjal qe ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj. Tnejil tu'mel a tu'n t-xi' qe' ak'aj u'jb'il. Noq na'nxa u'jb'il kye ajxnaq'tzanjtz te jun t-xaq tuj ju'njun q'ij txnaq'tzb'il tuj seman. Jaku kub' tb'inchana jun ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj te 5 t-xaq, teylex te ju'jun tuk'il tswejin tu'n tku'x tz'ib'et txolyol ex sak'ol tilb'ilal. Qe ajb'inchal txolxnaq'tz jaku kyjaw sak'o'n ttenb'il u'jb'il b'ananmaj tu'n tb'ant jun ak'aj u'jb'il, jun tuj ju'njun seman1.

trans-unit.source: The second way people can use templates is as source of new pages, regardless of how they started the book. For example, in some places, each book requires a page as part of a government approval process. You might make a template containing that page and give it to others in your country. Then, when people translate a shellbook, they go to the end of the book and click “Add Page”. The page you made will appear in their list of choices. Some other ideas for templates are alphabet charts, glossaries, and instructions on how to use the book in a classroom. 2
trans-unit.target: Tkab'in tu'mel tu'n tajb'en qe txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj kyu'n xjal ikytzan tloq'b'il qe ak'aj t-xaq, b'awtaq nya' tuj tu'mel xi qe' u'jb'il. Ikytzan ju'njun qe tnam, ju'njun u'jb'il ilxix ti'j tajb'il jun tekx t-xaq ikytzan jun tu'mel tu'n tk'amet tu'n wi'xin. B'a'n tu'n t-xi' tb'inchana jun txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj q'i'n tu'n t-xaq lu' ex tu'n t-xi' tq'o'na kye juntl tuj tanmiya. Oktzan meltz'et jun u'jb'il b'ananmaj kyu'n qe juntl, b'a'n kyxi' tuj mankb'il t-xaq u'jb'il ex tu'n t-xi' kyb'inchan clic tuj "Tz'aqsil t-xaq". Atzun te t-xaq o' kub' tb'inchana tzajal yek'it tuj txolil tu'mel. At ju'n qe nab'il tib'aj txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj b'i'x ntzaj tq'o'n ttenb'il techyol, qe txolb'ilyol, poqb'al tib'aj tza'n tu'n tajb'en u'jb'il tuj piẍjaxnaq'tz.2

trans-unit.source: Making templates is just like making any other custom book; all the same controls are available for making and customizing pages. But since you will probably be sharing with other people, there are a number of things you can do to help users of your template:
trans-unit.target: A qe txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj nchi kub' b'inchet ikytzan qe u'jb'il nchi b'ant noqx tu'n alkyex xjal, ax qe tu'mel tu'n chi b'aj ka'yit, te'qa tu'n chajb'en tu'n kyb'ant qe t-xaq te junx. B'ala t-xel tq'o'na qe txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj kye juntl xjal, at ila' tu'mel jaku kub' tb'inchana tu'n t-onina kyi'j qe alkyeqa qajb'ela txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj o' kub' tb'inchana:

trans-unit.source: Label Your Pages
trans-unit.target: Qokel b'ib'aj qe t-xaq

trans-unit.source: When you add pages to your template, make sure to give each one a useful label3,4:
trans-unit.target: Ok tok tq'o'ne qe t-xaq ti'j txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj, q'onxa te ju'njun t-xaq jun b'ib'aj qajb'elxix 34:

trans-unit.source: Check Your Thumbnails
trans-unit.target: Ki'n oka qe ni tal ch'in

trans-unit.source: To speed things up, Bloom only makes this thumbnail once, and stores it in the "template" subdirectory of your template:
trans-unit.target: Tuntzan taq'unan tuj tu'melxix, noqx jun maj nkub' tb'inchan Bloom ni tal ch'in lu' ex nxi tk'u'n tuj tkab'in ttenb'il kyb'i aq'unb'il "txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj" te tex txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj:

trans-unit.source: If you later make a change to the page, the thumbnail will be out of date. To fix that, click the "Add Page" button, and Bloom will regenerate those thumbnails. If the automatically generated thumbnail doesn't convey the purpose of the page, you can make your own. Just make sure to mark the file as "Read Only" so that Bloom doesn't overwrite it. You can also make your thumbnails as svgs, if you like (that's what we do for templates we ship with Bloom). In any case, make sure to click "Add Page" at least once before distributing your template, so that all the thumbnails are already generated.
trans-unit.target: Qa ma ch'ixpet jun tu' na tuj t-xaq, aj tilb'ilal ni ch'in kyjel tzak. Tu'n tjiqet, b'inchanxa clic tib'aj tech tz'ib' "Tz'aqsil t-xaq", ex Bloom qb'el tb'incha'n qe ni tal ch'in. Qa ni tal ch'in tu'nx ntzaj tyek'an tib' nti' ntzaj tma'n tuj tu'mel ti qajb'ela t-xaq, b'a'n tu'n tkub' tb'incha'na texixya ni tal ch'in. Tu'ntzan ilx ti'j tu'n tok techil nak'ub'il aq'unb'il tuk' "O'kx te Sch'ib'il" tu'ntzan min tz'ib'an Bloom kyb'aj qe. Ex qa tajxixya, ax b'a'n tu'n tkub' tb'incha'na qe ni tal ch'in ikytzan nak'ub'il aq'unb'il svgs. (Atzan jlu' nkub' qb'incha'ne kyi'j qe txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj nxi qsama'ne tuk' Bloom). Noqx alkye tu'mel, ilx ti'j tu'n tb'inchet clic tib'aj "Tz'aqsil t-xaq" jun maj na'ntaq t-xi sipet ttxolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj tu'ntzan xi kyb'incha'n kyib' kyaqil qe ni tal ch'in.

trans-unit.source: Document Your Template
trans-unit.target: Qokel tq'o'ne tu'jb'il txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj

trans-unit.source: Also consider adding a description of your template, like the one you are reading now. To do this, put a text file named ReadMe-en.md in your template's folder. This file should follow the markdown standard. To provide your instructions in other languages, make versions of that file that change the "en" to each language's two letter code. For example ReadMe-fr.md would be shown when Bloom is set to show labels in French. You can also include screenshots, like we have in this document. Place any images you use in a folder named "ReadMeImages", so that images are referenced like this:
trans-unit.target: Ax b'a'n tu'n tok jun poqb'al tib'aj ttxolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj, ikytzah njaw tsch'i'na ja'lo. Tu'n tb'ant jlu', q'o'n oka jun nak'ub'il aq'unb'il te txolyol a tb'i ReadMe-en.md tuj tkub'il jatuma ta' ttxolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj. Atzan te nak'ub'il aq'unb'il lu' ilx ti'j tu'n t-xi' tlajo'n aj q'ama'nmaj markdown standard. Tu'n t-xi tq'o'n qe chikb'ab'itz kyuj qe juntl yol, ilx ti'j tu'n tkub' tb'inchan ila' tu'mel ti'j nak'ub'il aq'unb'il lu' nb'aj tch'ixpu'n "en" nchok te kab'e techyol te techil ju'njun qe yol. Ikytzan jlu' ReadMe-fr.md tzajal tyek'an qa tok ti'j Bloom ttxolil aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' tu'n tzaj tyek'an qe techil tuj tyol mos. Ax b'a'n tokx tuj txolil tu'n tel tilb'ilal twitz xk'utz'ib', ikytzan qa ite' tuj u'jb'il lu'. Q'onku'xa kyaqil qe tilb'ilal n-najb'en tu'na tuj jun tkub'il a tb'i "ReadMeImages", oktzan tex poqb'al tib'aj qe tilb'ilal, k'elex ikytzan jlu':

trans-unit.source: When the Add Page dialog box shows your template pages, it will show a thumbnail:
trans-unit.target: Oktzan a te swejin te yolb'il "Tz'aqsil t-xaq" tzajil tyek'in qe t-xaq te txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj, ax tzajil tyek'in jun ni tal ch'in:

trans-unit.source: Share Your Template
trans-unit.target: Sipanxa txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj

trans-unit.source: Remember that Bloom is about planting seeds, about sharing. So plan to share your template on the BloomLibrary for people around the world to find. This takes just a few clicks in the Publish Tab.
trans-unit.target: Min kux naj ti'j tk'u'ja qa tuj Bloom nchi kux awet qe iyaj ex nchex sipit. B'a'n tu'n tkub' txi'mine tu'n tex tsipene txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj tuj Jau'jb'il te Bloom tu'ntzan kyaqil qe xjal twitz tx'otx' b'a'n tkanet kyu'nqe. O'kx tu'n tkub' b'inchet ju'nqe clics tib'aj xi'witz "k'elex poqb'al".

trans-unit.source: For local colleagues, an easy way to distribute your template is via a Bloom Pack. In the collections tab, right-click on your template's thumbnail. Choose 'Make Bloom Pack'. Save that somewhere, for example to a USB Key. Then take it to another computer, double click on the file you made, and your template will be added to the "Sources for New Books" on that computer.
trans-unit.target: Kye qe quk'ila te ax, jun tu'mel q'uyin tu'n tex sipet ttxolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj atzan tuj jun tenej Bloom. Tuj xi'witz te k'loj te ila' wiq, b'inchanxa clic tuj manq'ab'aj tib'aj ni tal ch'in txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj. Sak'onqtza 'B'inchal jun tenej te Bloom'. K'u'nxa tuj jun tenb'il, ikytzan jun makb'il aq'unb'il xk'utz'ib' USB. Q'o'n oka ti'j juntl xk'utz'ib', b'inchanxa cab'e clic tib'aj nak'ub'il aq'unb'il o' t-xi' tb'incha'ne, atzan ttxolb'ab'ila aq'untb'ila b'incha'nmaj tz'aqsetil ti'j qe "Tloq'b'il kye ak'aj u'jb'il" tuj xk'utz'ib'.

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: Tz'ib'ajtz

trans-unit.source: 1: These books could later be combined using the forthcoming Folio feature. Note that Bloom does not yet give you a way to indicate that a page should be automatically included in new books; the author will have to add each one from the Add Page dialog.
trans-unit.target: 1: Qe u'jb'il lu' jaku b'a'n tu'n kymojb'et tuj tu'mel tuj juntl amb'il tuk' taq'un te techil tajlal. Min kux naj ti tk'u'ja qa namx kanet jun tu'mel tu'n Bloom tu'n tzaj tma'n qa il ti'j tu'n tokx tu'nxtib' jun t-xaq kyuj qe ak'aj u'jb'il; il ti'j tu'n tz'aqset ju'njun t-xaq tu'n ajb'inchalte tujxa swejin te q'amab'il te "Q'on oka juntl t-xaq".

trans-unit.source: 2: If you don't want the pages in your template to show up in the Add Page dialog, you can indicate this to Bloom by creating a file in the book's template folder called NotForAddPage.txt.
trans-unit.target: 2: Qa tk'i'ya tu'n min tzaj tyek'in tuj swejin q'amab'ilte "Q'on oka juntl t-xaq" qe t-xaq te txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj, b'a'n tu'n t-xi' tma'ne jlu' te Bloom tu'n jun b'inchab'il nak'ub'il aq'unb'il a tb'i "NorForAddPage.txt." tuj k'ub'il te txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj te U'jb'il.

trans-unit.source: 3: People will not be able to translate your labels and descriptions into other national languages. If this is a problem, please contact the Bloom team.
trans-unit.target: 3: Nlayx b'ant kyu'n ju'njun xjal tu'n tmeltz'et qe tech b'ib'aj tuk' q'amab'itz kyuj qe juntl yol twitz Paxil. Qa nya b'a'n jlu', txaqonxa kye k'loj xjal b'a'nxix kyu'n te Bloom.

trans-unit.source: 4: If you want the Add Page screen to also provide a short description of the page, you'll need to quit Bloom and edit the template's html in Notepad, like this:
trans-unit.target: 4: Qa taja tu'n tzaj yek'in tu'n tilb'il te "Q'on oka juntl t-xaq" jun ch'in q'amab'itz tib'aj t-xaq, il ti'j tu'n tetzti'n tib'a ti'j Bloom ex qxel b'inchet nak'ub'il aq'unb'il html te txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj tuj "Notepad", ikytzan jlu':
